title: Japan's Economy and Monetary Policy
text:
-- Growing Uncertainties Surrounding Overseas Economies and Enhancement of Monetary Easing -- Speech at a Meeting with Business Leaders in Kanagawa Kikuo Iwata

Deputy Governor of the Bank of Japan

August 4, 2016
